title: is it possible to get a somewhat presentable t206 bobby wallace for $35
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: is it possible to get a somewhat presentable t206 bobby wallace for $35

posts.post_content:
This one went for $32.06 late last year.  Tough to find but it can be done.

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=190596008178[/url]

Sean, 

I am pretty sure I have a low grade example. Let me check when I get home and I will send you a scan...

posts.post_title: There is a Wallace for $35 in this thread ($2 off at the bottom)
